trans-unit.source: An activity that manages the execution of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> within a workflow.
The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> activity will not appear in the workflow designer toolbox unless the workflow's project has its `Target Framework` setting set to `.Net Framework 4`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop>除非工作流的项目具有活动不会出现在工作流设计器工具箱其`Target Framework`设置设为`.Net Framework 4`。

trans-unit.source: Due to limitations in the interface types that the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> activity can support, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> cannot be used directly, but derivative activities created using the Workflow Communication Activity tool (WCA.exe) can be used.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 活动可以支持的接口类型的限制，因此无法直接使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity>，但是可以使用通过工作流通信活动工具 (WCA.exe) 创建的派生活动。

trans-unit.source: See [Windows Workflow Foundation Tools](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178889) for details.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[Windows Workflow Foundation 工具](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178889)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> class.

The collection of name-value pairs that corresponds to the metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />, such as an activity’s <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name" /> property, or a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity" /> activity’s <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.While.Condition" /> property.
The collection of metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 元数据的集合<see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of name-value pairs that corresponds to the input and output properties of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The collection of input and output properties of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 输入和输出属性的集合<see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the activity contained by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> activity.
The type of the activity contained by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> 活动包含的活动类型。

trans-unit.source: This type must derive from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此类型必须派生自 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of attributes for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The attribute collection for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Interop> 实例被强制转换为 <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the class of the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The class name of the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

Returns the editor for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The editor for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

Returns the collection of events for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
The collection of events.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

Returns the collection of properties for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" /> that represents the collection of properties for the contained <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: The property whose owner is to be retrieved.
Returns the owner of the specified property descriptor or the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> activity itself if the property descriptor has no owner.
The property owner or the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Interop" /> activity itself if the property descriptor has no owner.
